• Implements a full multiplayer mining game with real-time networking via MQTT.
  • Features mobile-optimized touch controls with landscape/portrait layouts.
  • Includes persistent save/load system using IndexedDB and file import/export.
  • Adds admin/host election system for managing game state and map syncing.
  • Supports advanced features like teleporters, explosions (TNT/Nuke), and a shop system.

This web application delivers a complete multiplayer mining experience with procedurally generated maps, real-time synchronization, and extensive customization. The game supports both desktop and mobile play, features a robust admin system for managing multiplayer sessions, and includes persistent storage for player progress and world states. Advanced mechanics like teleporters, explosives, and a shop system create engaging gameplay depth.
